comments:
This manifests itself when generating a package with loadingInitialization=true. Code generation is done in a WorkspaceModificationOperation executing on a background thread.  The resource with the EPackage in it is saved, and in handling the notification, the editor tries to update the UI.

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Invalid thread access
at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3374)
at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3297)
at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3268)
at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.error(Widget.java:432)
at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.checkWidget(Widget.java:328)
at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.getData(Widget.java:485)
at org.eclipse.ui.part.MultiPageEditorPart.getEditor(MultiPageEditorPart.java:421)
at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.genmodel.presentation.GenModelEditor.updateProblemIndication(GenModelEditor.java:671)
at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.genmodel.presentation.GenModelEditor$2.notifyChanged(GenModelEditor.java:399)
at org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.BasicNotifierImpl.eNotify(BasicNotifierImpl.java:230)
at org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.NotifyingListImpl.dispatchNotification(NotifyingListImpl.java:260)
at org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.NotifyingListImpl.clear(NotifyingListImpl.java:1096)
at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.impl.ResourceImpl.save(ResourceImpl.java:931)
at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.impl.ResourceImpl.save(ResourceImpl.java:876)
at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.genmodel.generator.GenPackageGeneratorAdapter.generatePackageSerialization(GenPackageGeneratorAdapter.java:226)
at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.genmodel.generator.GenPackageGeneratorAdapter.generateModel(GenPackageGeneratorAdapter.java:156)
at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.genmodel.generator.GenBaseGeneratorAdapter.doGenerate(GenBaseGeneratorAdapter.java:154)
at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.generator.AbstractGeneratorAdapter.generate(AbstractGeneratorAdapter.java:170)
at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.generator.Generator.generate(Generator.java:304)
at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.genmodel.presentation.GenModelActionBarContributor$8.execute(GenModelActionBarContributor.java:370)
at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation$1.run(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:101)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1737)
at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation.run(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:113)
at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)

This UI update should be executed on the UI thread.
